page.title: 16SHOPPING
page.content: Hutton Henry has only one shop.It is a Post Office and General Dealer and sells food,sweets,stationary and frozen foods.There are also vans coming to the village-a baker,a butcher,a fishmonger,an ice cream man and a coalman.These travelling shops come to the village because if they did not people would have to go out of the area to do their shopping.Station Town and Wingate have lots of shops, such as the Co-op,newsagents,take_away food shops,general dealers, bakers, butchers and clothes shops. There is also an open-air market on a Thursday. If you want clothes or something special you will have to go to a large town such as Peterlee, Hartlepool, Sunderland,Stockton or Newcastle.Each Friday there is a special bus that takes shoppers to a hypermarket at Stockton.
